headline: Short Seller Jim Chanos Calls Elon Musk's Orbital Datacenter Goals 'AI Snake Oil' — Says Need To See 'Actual' Savings
summary: Short seller James Chanos criticizes tech's push for orbital datacenters, citing high costs as AI's demand for power surges.
